title: Fergus Burke
text: Fergus Burke (born 3 September 1999 in <a href="New%20Zealand">New Zealand</a>) is a <a href="New%20Zealand">New Zealand</a> <a href="rugby%20union">rugby union</a> player who plays for the in <a href="Super%20Rugby">Super Rugby</a>. His playing position is <a href="Fly-half%20%28rugby%20union%29">fly-half</a>. He has signed for the Crusaders squad in 2020.
